document_data.mainbody:
ord Laeros Assumbar was the patriarch of the Assumbar noble family of Waterdeep during the late 14 century DR.
Laeros funded the majority of the Chapel and Chalice of the Divine Rights expenses. The Chapel, which was located within the Assumbar Villa, was dedicated to Siamorphe. Laeros was pleased with the positive attention the Chapel and Siamorphes worship brought to his family.
Laeros married Lady Kerri of the Gulderhorn family. Their children were Harlaa
